item.title: Psychology Says ‘Skillcactions’ Are the Most Refreshing Vacations
item.description: I just got back from a beach vacation and still feel beat. Psychologists suggest I should have tried a skillcation instead.

item.title: The Labor Market Is Making a Clear Case for Fed Rate Cuts
item.description: The S&P 500 has rebounded 27 percent from its April lows.

item.title: Amazon Is Ending a Beloved Prime Shipping Benefit. Here’s What Will Change on October 1
item.description: The Seattle e-commerce giant is tightening its rules for benefits sharing, taking a cue from fellow subscription services such as Netflix and Disney.

item.title: How ŌURA Got Caught in a TikTok Conspiracy Storm
item.description: The viral outrage over ŌURA’s government contract has taken on a life of its own. Here’s what actually happened.

item.title: Moody’s Chief Economist Says the U.S. Is ‘on the Precipice’ of a Recession
item.description: The biggest litmus test for the state of the economy is coming this Friday, says Mark Zandi.
